sub_title: Strategic Partnerships Lead at Quantum Delta NL
summary:
Personal vision: "getting to zero carbon leveraging a new generation of technologies”

Profile:
Innovation executive with a passion for building dynamic teams that excel in delivering digital & sustainable solutions. With an eye for opportunity and talent, I connect the different worlds of business, non-profit, public service and science. As a strong communicator and with a forward-looking mentality, I have the ability to make people enjoy working towards a joint goal under my leadership. 

Highlights of Expertise: 
•	Vision for digital innovation & sustainability
•	Thought leader on navigating geopolitics for the high tech industry (quantum, AI)
•	Strong communicator & partnership builder
•	Entrepreneurial execution
•	Active in business, non-profit, public & science
•	Experienced diplomat (US, European Union, Netherlands)
•	5 EU working languages
